name: Lost Temple Treasure
description:
A highly unusual action-adventure game. 

Venture into a haunted temple to find treasure.

Contains:

  • Giant mechanical spiders
  • Tall screechy shadow people
  • Hidden secrets 
  • Mr. Succ 
  • Questionable dialogue 
  • Boss battles 
  • Drug use(?) 
  • Story, wave, and hardcore modes 
  • Destructible environments 
  • Sentient AI 

This game is not normal. 

Good luck.
